paper_abstract: We study the fixed parameter tractability of the counting version of a parameterization of the restrictive list H-coloring problem. The parameterization is defined by fixing the number of preimages of a subset C of the vertices in H through a weight assignment K on C. We show the fixed parameter tractability of counting the number of list (H. C, K)-colorings, for the case in which (H, C, K) is simple. We introduce the concept of compactor and a new algorithmic technique, compactor enumeration, that allow us to design fixed parameter algorithms for parameterized counting problems. (c) 2008 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Efficient algorithms for counting parameterized list H-colorings
